full_summary:
**Title: Request for Invitation to Bid for a CORE Roster of Investigators**

[Reference Number: cb-5824-87331088]

[Publication Date: May 24, 2023]
[Tender Closing Date: July 21, 2023 2:00 PM EST]

The Government of Canada invites prospective bidders to submit a proposal to provide a roster of diverse human rights investigators for the CORE initiative. The CORE aims to promote business and human rights in the international arena, addressing complex and systemic human rights issues arising in conflict-ridden or fragile states.

### Call to Action
The CORE requires a standing offer of experienced investigators to conduct independent fact-finding investigations, focusing on allegations of human rights abuses. Bidders will have the opportunity to deliver investigation services on an as-needed basis through a call-up process.

### Tender Details
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Tender Status: *Expired*
* Language of Tender: English and French
* Duration of Contract: August 1, 2023, to July 31, 2024
* Location: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Prequalification Requirements
The proposed investigation team must possess the necessary skills and expertise to conduct thorough and unbiased investigations. A comprehensive estimate of costs, including a detailed breakdown of fees, will be required.

### Evaluation Criteria
The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

### Contact Information
To request clarification on tender requirements or discuss this opportunity, contact:
Betty Woodman, Contract Administrator
International Trade and Commerce Branch, CA
Considering the tender's December 31, 2024, end date, eligible bidders must submit their proposals by the closing deadline to be considered for the standing offer. Please visit the Canada Buy & Sell website for any updates or further information on this notice.
